children.summary: The female athlete, wearing a blue and red uniform, crosses the finish line with a time of 12.24 seconds, surpassing her personal best of 12.91 seconds, as the crowd cheers her on. With a beaming face and raised arms, she celebrates her triumph.

children.caption: A female athlete competes in a track and field event, setting a personal best time of 12.24 seconds and crossing the finish line with a triumphant gesture and joyful expression, demonstrating determination and joy throughout the race.

modalities.visual: A female athlete competes in a track and field event, setting a personal best time of 12.24 seconds and crossing the finish line with a triumphant gesture and joyful expression, demonstrating determination and joy throughout the race.
modalities.speech: Osleide Menendez, the world record holder, threw a huge 71-meter javelin to start the competition, putting her in a strong position to challenge the championship record of 69.53 meters.

children.summary: A female athlete crosses the finish line multiple times, achieving personal best times of 14.91 and 12.24 seconds, and celebrating her triumph with joy and raised arms. Her scores of 16.91 and 12.24 are displayed on the scoreboard as the crowd cheers her on.

tree.caption: A female athlete competes in a track and field event, showcasing her determination and focus as she sprints and throws the javelin, with the crowd cheering her on and an announcer providing commentary. She sets a personal best time of 12.24 seconds and crosses the finish line with a triumphant gesture and joyful expression, demonstrating determination and joy throughout the race.

tree.summary: A female athlete, dressed in a red and white uniform, sprints down the track with determination and focus, achieving personal best times of 14.91 and 12.24 seconds in multiple attempts. She crosses the finish line with joy and raised arms, celebrating her triumph as the crowd cheers her on.
